standard.description: These tests run against the DB objects and therefore may be hard to associate with a given application. They can be associated with the Application Standards Tracker app.

test.query_clob:
with var_assgn as (select signature, max(line) last_line
                    from v_user_identifiers ui
                    where ui.type = 'VARIABLE'
                    and ui.usage = 'ASSIGNMENT'
                    group by signature),
     cur_ref_count
            as (select signature, count(*) refcount
                  from v_user_identifiers
                  where usage = 'REFERENCE'
                  and type = 'CONSTANT'
                  group by signature),
     ccode 
            as (select
                case when ui.type = 'CONSTANT' 
                        then case when ui.object_type = 'PACKAGE'
                                  then case when (ui.name not like 'GC_%') 
                                            then 'SPEC_CONSTANT'
                                            end
                                  when ui.object_type = 'PACKAGE BODY' 
                                    then case when ui.usage_context_id  = 1
                                              then case when ui.name not like 'GC_%'
                                                        then 'GLOBAL_CONSTANT'
                                                        else case when crc.refcount < 2
                                                                  then case when ui.name not in ('GC_SCOPE_PREFIX', 'GC_N', 'GC_Y')
                                                                            then 'LOCAL_GLOBAL_CONSTANT'
                                                                            end
                                                                  end 
                                                        end
                                              else case when  (ui.name not like 'C_%')
                                                        then 'LOCAL_CONSTANT'
                                                        end
                                              end
                                 end
                     when ui.type = 'VARIABLE'
                     then case when ui.object_type = 'PACKAGE'
                               then 'SPEC_VARIABLE'
                               when ui.object_type = 'PACKAGE BODY'
                               then case when ui.line = va.last_line
                                         then 'CONSTANT_VARIABLE'
                                         end
                               end
                     when ui.type in ('CURSOR','REFCURSOR') 
                     then case when ui.name not like 'CUR_%'
                               then 'CURSOR'
                               end 
                     when ui.type in ('INDEX TABLE', 'NESTED TABLE', 'ASSOCIATIVE ARRAY') 
                     then case when ui.name not like 'T_%'
                               then 'TABLE_TYPE'
                               end
                     when ui.type in ('FORMAL IN','FORMAL OUT', 'FORMAL IN OUT') 
                     then case when ui.name not like 'P_%'
                               then 'PROC_PARAM'
                               end
                     when ui.type = 'RECORD'
                     then case when ui.name not like 'R_%'
                               then 'RECORD_TYPE'
                               end 
                     when ui.type in ('BLOB DATATYPE','BOOLEAN DATATYPE','CHARACTER DATATYPE','CLOB DATATYPE','DATE DATATYPE','NUMBER DATATYPE', 'SUBTYPE','TIMESTAMP DATATYPE')
                     then case when ui.name not like 'TY_%'
                               then 'DATATYPE'
                               end
                     when ui.type = 'EXCEPTION'
                     then case when ui.name not like 'E_%'
                               then 'EXCEPTION'
                               end
                     end as child_code,
                null src_id, 
                ui.object_name, 
                ui.name code, 
                ui.object_type, 
                ui.line,
                to_char(ui.signature) unqid,
								ui.owner
                from v_user_identifiers ui
                left join var_assgn va on ui.signature = va.signature
                left join cur_ref_count crc on ui.signature = crc.signature
                where ui.usage = 'DECLARATION'
                and ui.implicit = 'NO'
                and ui.object_name not like 'XXX%'
                and ui.name not in ('GC_SCOPE_PREFIX', 'GC_N', 'GC_Y'))
select 
case when child_code is null
    then 'Y'
    else 'N'
    end pass_yn,
object_name,
apex_string.format('%0 %1 in `%2` %3, line %4',
                    p0 => code,
                    p1 => case child_code 
                          when 'CONSTANT_VARIABLE'
                          then 'must be a constant (it is currently a variable)'
                          when 'CURSOR'
                          then 'must begin with cur_ (it is a cursor)'
                          when 'DATATYPE'
                          then 'must begin with ty_ (it is a datatype)'
                          when 'EXCEPTION'
                          then 'must begin with e_ (it is an Exception)'
                          when 'GLOBAL_CONSTANT'
                          then 'must begin with gc_ (it is a package body global constant)'
                          when 'LOCAL_CONSTANT'
                          then 'must begin with c_ (it is a package body local constant) '
                          when 'LOCAL_GLOBAL_CONSTANT'
                          then 'should be a local constant (it is currently a global constant)'
                          when 'PROC_PARAM'
                          then 'must begin with p_ (it is a procedure parameter)'
                          when 'RECORD_TYPE'
                          then 'must begin with r_ (it is a Record type)'
                          when 'SPEC_CONSTANT'
                          then 'must begin with gc_ (it is a package spec constant)'
                          when 'SPEC_VARIABLE'
                          then 'should be moved to the package body'
                          when 'TABLE_TYPE'
                          then 'must being with t_ (it is a Table type)'
                          end,
									 p2 => object_name,
									 p3 => object_type,
									 p4 => line
) code,
object_type,
line,
unqid,
owner schema
from ccode
where child_code is not null
test.explanation:
*   CONSTANT\_VARIABLE : This variable should be a constant
*   CURSOR : Cursor names must begin with cur\_
*   DATATYPE : Datatypes must begin with ty\_
*   EXCEPTION : Exceptions must begin with e\_
*   GLOBAL\_CONSTANT : Package body global constants must begin with gc\_
*   LOCAL\_CONSTANT : Package body local constants must begin with c\_
*   LOCAL\_GLOBAL\_CONSTANT : This global constant should be a local constant
*   PROC\_PARAM : Procedure parameters must begin with p\_
*   RECORD\_TYPE : Record types must begin with r\_
*   SPEC\_CONSTANT : Package spec constants must begin with gc\_
*   SPEC\_VARIABLE : Variables in the package spec are discouraged
*   TABLE\_TYPE : Table types must begin with t\_
test.fix:
*   CONSTANT\_VARIABLE : Make the variable a constant
*   CURSOR : Fix the name
*   DATATYPE : Fix the name
*   EXCEPTION : Fix the name
*   GLOBAL\_CONSTANT : Fix the name
*   LOCAL\_CONSTANT : Fix the name
*   LOCAL\_GLOBAL\_CONSTANT : Make it a local constant
*   PROC\_PARAM : Fix the name
*   RECORD\_TYPE : Fix the name
*   SPEC\_CONSTANT : Fix the name
*   SPEC\_VARIABLE : Remove the variable from the package spec
*   TABLE\_TYPE : Fix the name
